Episodes.Title: Who's Afraid of Mr. Wolf? (1)
Episodes.Plot:
A group of ex-soldiers rob a bank but the heist goes wrong and they end up in the bank  taking hostages.
The situation in the bank makes a turn for the worse when police turns off electricity and Wolf threatens to kill a hostage.

Episodes.Title: Who's Afraid of Mr. Wolf? (2)
Episodes.Plot: The situation in the bank makes a turn for the worse when police turns off electricity and Wolf threatens to kill a hostage.

Episodes.Title: No Meringue
Episodes.Plot: The new FBI negotiator has no intention of giving into more demands, Wolf is trying to get a birthday cake for one of the hostages. The negotiations with the rich father of one of the hostages turn out bad and another hostage masked as HT gets shot.

Episodes.Title: Pro Patria
Episodes.Plot: Horst isn't sure he can trust Mr. Wolf after a hostage is shot. Alan Beck contacts Mr. Wolf as the getaway driver plans a different escape plot for the team.

Episodes.Title: Visiting Hours
Episodes.Plot: Horst and Mr. Wolf have some unexpected guests. As Horst interrogates one of Wolf's former partners, the hostages try to escape.

Episodes.Title: The Great Ape Escape
Episodes.Plot: Horst investigates one of Wolf's former comrades, and makes a surprising discovery; an extraction plan is set into motion.

Episodes.Title: The Devil's Zoo (1)
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Rabbit takes over the role of leader as Wolf struggles with his emotions. Mr.Rabbit's leadership scares everyone including Capt. Horst who starts to think of new ways to get everyone out safely.

Episodes.Title: The Devil's Zoo (2)
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Rabbit takes over the role of leader as Wolf struggles with his emotions. Mr.Rabbit's leadership scares everyone including Capt. Horst who starts to think of new ways to get everyone out safely.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
